User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://ziontechgroup.com/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://ziontechgroup.com/sitemap

# Crawl-delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /static/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
Allow: /services
Allow: /technologies
